title: Norwegian style guide
content:
Good afternoon. I’m looking for a norwegian style guide adressing punctuation. Qoutes and footnotes/endnotes in particular. Thank you in advance.

 [‹ Philadelphia Typographic Hotspots](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121132021/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41750 "Go to previous forum topic") [Speaking of tabular figures... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121132021/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41464 "Go to next forum topic")
author: frode frank

comments.content: Edit: Footnotes and endnotes aren’t punctuation:)

Sounds pretty hard to find.

Héctor
